mapper.select: select id, name, freeMins, startExpense, timeoutPrice, timeoutPriceInterval, maxExpense, nightStartTime, nightEndTime, isOneTimeExpense, oneTimeExpense from feeCriterion
mapper.insert: insert into feeCriterion(name, freeMins, startExpense, timeoutPrice, timeoutPriceInterval, maxExpense, nightStartTime, nightEndTime, isOneTimeExpense, oneTimeExpense) values(#{name}, #{freeMins}, #{startExpense}, #{timeoutPrice}, #{timeoutPriceInterval}, #{maxExpense}, #{nightStartTime}, #{nightEndTime}, #{isOneTimeExpense}, #{oneTimeExpense})
